column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We drove almost 40 mins to get here only to discover that breakfast had ended ten minutes earlier at 10:30 (Which is a little too early in my opinion...). We were bummed
column2: but since we were already there
column3: we decided to stay and order lunch.... Only to be told that lunch doesn't start till 11:00! What kind of foolery is that?  Why the 30 minute gap between breakfast and lunch?  Anyway
